title: After-Hours Earnings Report for September 5, 2019 : LULU, DOCU, GWRE, SAIC, ABM, KFY, ZUMZ, DOMO, NX, CDMO, CULP, VISI - Nasdaq.com
text: The following companies are expected to repor   t earnings    after hours on 09/05/2019. Visit our      Earnings Calendar    for a full list of expected earnings releases.    lululemon athletica inc.    (   LULU    ) is reporting for the quarter ending July 31, 2019. The textile   company's consensus earnings per share forecast from the 14   analysts that follow the stock is $0.89. This value represents a   25.35% increase compared to the same quarter last year. In the   past year LULU has beat the expectations every quarter. The   highest one was in the 2nd calendar quarter where they beat the   consensus by 4.23%. Zacks Investment Research reports that the   2020 Price to Earnings ratio for LULU is 38.94 vs. an industry   ratio of 16.70, implying that they will have a higher earnings   growth than their competitors in the same industry. (   GWRE    ) is reporting for the quarter ending July 31, 2019. The business   software company's consensus earnings per share forecast from the   4 analysts that follow the stock is $0.27.
